casebody.data:
IN RE DAMIAN G. et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 24, 2018

Michael S. Taylor, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Parul Patel, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petition by the respondent mother for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn.App. 220, 174 A.3d 232 (2017), is denied.

ROBINSON and D'AURIA, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
